full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Acquisition of Microwave for Challenger Aircraft
=====================================================

**Solicitation Information**

* Solicitation Number: T8493-230014/A
* Solicitation Title: Acquisition of Microwave for Challenger Aircraft 6152 (Reference: PW-CAG-017-29092)
* Solicitation Status: Expired
* Tender Closing Date: [06/19/2023] [14:00:00][CST]

**Trade Agreement and Region**

* This procurement is governed by the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).
* The region of delivery for this solicitation is British Columbia, Canada.

**Tender Description**

The Crown is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a microwave unit (1 quantity) for the Challenger Aircraft 6152 (Tail No. 620), owned by Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).

The acquisition will be made under the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series. A Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) was published in the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) to invite qualified suppliers to submit proposals.

**Eligible Proponents**

* This solicitation is restricted to suppliers who are qualified under the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series, as listed in the attached Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP).

**Submittal Requirements**

* Proposals are due 14:00:00 [CST] on [06/19/2023].
* The proposal must be submitted electronically to the Contracting Authority at the address provided below.
* Do not submit proposals through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

**Contact Information**

* Valerie Bourassa, Contracting Officer: valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca; 873-455-0980
* Oliver Morones, Supply Specialist: oliver.morones@tpsgc.gc.ca; 873-455-5233

**Note**

* This is an on-going opportunity for qualification. A Notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) to invite additional suppliers to become qualified under the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Yellow Highlighting shows my edits.
You may have some questions, I'll be happy to answer them. What
